vsParam:
Let's go to Rose Hip to see how it goes there...
Oh, [px]! Look, over there!

That girl is injured!
Hey, lady! Are you all right!?

Huh!? Wai... Wait!
We're not suspicious people! Please drop your weapon!

That's exactly what suspicious people would say!
Who on earth are you!?

Calm down.
As she said, we're not suspicious.

We came from the Academy, here to complete
our quest of repelling monsters. We mean no harm.

Eh, that voice and appearance...
Are you Sterk?

Uh, yeah, I am Sterk.
And you are...

Hold... Hold on!
Forget that, let us treat your wounds first!
Yeah. Let's talk it over when we arrive at Lord Rose Hip's mansion!

Yeah, um, you're Mimi...
Mimi Hollon Von... Uh? What is it again...

Mimi Houllier von Schwarzlang.
Just call me Mimi.

Um... Yeah! Well, Mimi is an adventurer.
You were on an adventure today as usual?

And then, you came to somewhere strange
and got attacked by monsters...

Exactly...
Sorry that I suspected you when we first met.

Not your fault.
After all, you suffered a lot of inconceivable incidents.

Yeah. Plus, monsters are out of control.
It's been amazing enough for you to have escaped.

How could I lose to monsters!?
It's them who escaped, OK?!

Oh, um... I... I see.
Sorry we got you wrong...

Yeah... Right! We can tell you're powerful
from the way you raised your gun just now!

Exactly. I was born as in the noble Schwarzlangs...
Ouch!?

Oh, don't push it! Hey, Rose Hip!
Can't you give us more medicine?
Uh, I want to give you more...

But people are suffering everywhere.
I've run out of all my medicine.
Right... Oh, we could just ask [px] to make medicine for us!

Yeah!
Make a batch of super effective medicine, [px]!
